user_question: What is the most expensive movie ever made, and what were some of the unique challenges faced during its production?
final_answer: As of 2023, 'Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides' is considered one of the most expensive movies ever made, with a production cost of approximately $379 million. Some unique challenges included extensive location shoots, complex visual effects, and managing a large cast and crew.
